To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private SpinningTop _spinningtop;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_spinningtop = SpinningTop(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_spinningtop.IsReady)
{
    var current = _spinningtop.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.spinningtop = self.SpinningTop(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.spinningtop.IsReady:
    current = self.spinningtop.Current.Value
